name: skrzynie
description:
Your mission is to organize messy, storage room flooded with different types of crates, while trying to fullfill neverending orders for storage goods. You have only one little forklift on your disposal, and a lot of time, so don't rush, but try to keep it tidy and organised.

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • U, J to move forklift forks up and down
  • H, K strafe (only after unlocking omniwheel)
  • M to mute
